Package me.mayhem.util.ui.impl

Class ButtonInteractable

java.lang.Object
me.mayhem.input.InputListener<org.jsfml.window.event.MouseEvent>
me.mayhem.input.impl.mouse.MouseInputListener
me.mayhem.util.ui.AbstractMouseInteractable
me.mayhem.util.ui.impl.ButtonInteractable
All Implemented Interfaces:
Interactable
Direct Known Subclasses:
HomePageLoadButton, HomePageNewGameButton, HomepageQuitButton, LoadGameFileButton, LoadPageReturnButton, LoseNewGameButton, LoseReturnButton, NameSelectContinueButton, NextPageButton, PreviousPageButton, ReturnButton, ReturnButton, ReturnToGameButton, ReturnToMainMenuButton, SettingsPageEasyButton, SettingsPageHardButton, SettingsPageMediumButton, SettingsPageReturnButton, SettingsPageTutorialButton, TutorialReturnButton, WinContinueButton, WinSaveButton
public abstract class ButtonInteractable
extends AbstractMouseInteractable
An abstract implementation of the Interactable interface and the AbstractMouseInteractable that handles when the button is clicked by checking the click is in the area and passing it down to the concrete implementation of the class It handles centering the text both vertically and horizontally
